title: Banaras Pattu Katti Lyrics Ninaithale Inikkum
stanzas:
You know ladies
its time to show
some real love

banaras pattu katti
mallipoo konda vachi
singapore seematti
emmanasa keduthaa

ava mundhaana
poova kandu
en uyiru puttukichu.
sindhaama sedharaama
en kadhaya mudichaa

merae pia
merae pia pia ho
merae pia (3)

banaras pattu katti
mallipoo konda vachi
singapore seematti
emmanasa keduthaa

un moochu vaasanaiyil
rojakkal down down
down down..down..down..

merae pia
merae pia pia ho
merae pia (3)

banaras pattu katti
mallipoo konda vachi
singapore seematti
emmanasa keduthaa

pakkathile nee vandhaa
pulse rate-u down down
down..down..down..down..

unna paartha naal mudhala
full mealsu down down
down..down..down..down..

merae pia
merae pia pia ho
merae pia (3)

banaras pattu katti
mallipoo konda vachi
singapore seematti
emmanasa keduthaa
